name: Shoot or Shout!
description:
In "Shoot or Shout!" we have two players. A shooter and a shouter. The shooter shoots the enemies and the shouter can taunt them. The goal is to keep both players alive by taunting and shooting the enemies.

Shout out to Kripanshu for creating the menu screen graphic for me:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/kripanshu-dixit-b0515a1b7/

Important: The game seems to have issues with windowed mode, please play in fullscreen.
